content: {A笑哈哈}Welcome back, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! One of our Neighbors told me how much they love the home you designed. They said it made them feel full of joy, hoho!
info: 露卡瓶10-莫白_主流程文本II

content: Also, this jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> is now full. Here you go. Use it to keep watering the Luca Arbor.
info: 露卡瓶10-莫白_主流程文本II
